item.title: Warp Consistency for Unsupervised Learning of Dense Correspondences
item.description:
ICCV 2021 Oral
Unsupervised method for learning dense correspondences and optical flow on real image pairs.

item.title: Deep Reparametrization of Multi-Frame Super-Resolution and Denoising
item.description:
ICCV 2021 Oral
Deep optimization-based formulation for multi-frame super-resolution and denoising.

item.title: Generating Masks from Boxes by Mining Spatio-Temporal Consistencies in Videos
item.description:
ICCV 2021
An optimization-based architecture for converting video bounding box annotations to segmentation masks.

item.title: Learning Target Candidate Association to Keep Track of What Not to Track
item.description:
ICCV 2021
Associating the target and distractor objects for robust visual tracking.

item.title: Hierarchical Conditional Flow: A Unified Framework for Image Super-Resolution and Image Rescaling
item.description:
ICCV 2021
A unified hierarchical normalizing flow architecture for super-resolution and image rescaling.

item.title: Scaling Semantic Segmentation Beyond 1K Classes on a Single GPU
item.description:
ICCV 2021
Reducing memory complexity for training semantic segmentation models with large number of classes.

item.title: Local Memory Attention for Fast Video Semantic Segmentation
item.description:
IROS 2021
A local memory cross-attention module for fast video semantic segmentation.

item.title: Learning Accurate Dense Correspondences and When to Trust Them
item.description:
CVPR 2021 Oral
A method that gives you accurate dense optical flow and correspondences with robust uncertainty.

item.title: DeFlow: Learning Complex Image Degradations from Unpaired Data with Conditional Flows
item.description:
CVPR 2021 Oral
A novel unpaired learning formulation for conditional normalizing flows with applications to learning image degradations.

item.title: Deep Burst Super-Resolution
item.description:
CVPR 2021
An attention based architecture and real-world dataset for burst super-resolution.

item.title: The Heterogeneity Hypothesis: Finding Layer-Wise Dissimilated Network Architecture
item.description:
CVPR 2021
We tackle the problem of convolutional neural network design by adjusting the channel configurations of predefined networks.

item.title: Few-Shot Classification By Few-Iteration Meta-Learning
item.description:
ICRA 2021
An optimization-based meta-learning approach for few-shot classification.

item.title: DeepSVG: A Hierarchical Generative Network for Vector Graphics Animation
item.description:
NeurIPS 2020
Dataset and method for generating vector graphics.

item.title: GOCor: Bringing Globally Optimized Correspondence Volumes into Your Neural Network
item.description:
NeurIPS 2020
A fully differentiable dense matching module for your correspondence or optical flow network.

item.title: How to Train Your Energy-Based Model for Regression
item.description:
BMVC 2020
Investigating how to train a deep energy-based model for accurate regression.

item.title: Learning What to Learn for Video Object Segmentation
item.description:
ECCV 2020 Oral
An optimization-based few-shot learner for VOS.

item.title: SRFlow: Learning the Super-Resolution Space with Normalizing Flow
item.description:
ECCV 2020 Spotlight
Normalizing flow based super-resolution method capable of learning the conditional distribution of the output given the low-resolution input.

item.title: Energy-Based Models for Deep Probabilistic Regression
item.description:
ECCV 2020
A general method for accurate regression by learning the conditional target probability distribution as a deep energy-based model.

item.title: Video Object Segmentation with Episodic Graph Memory Networks
item.description:
ECCV 2020 Spotlight
A graph-based memory module for Video Object Segmentation.

item.title: Know Your Surroundings: Exploiting Scene Information for Object Tracking
item.description:
ECCV 2020
A tracking architecture that exploits the knowledge about the presence of other objects in the surrounding scene to prevent failure.

item.title: GLU-Net: Global-Local Universal Network for Dense Flow and Correspondences
item.description:
CVPR 2020 Oral
A unified network architecture for dense correspondences applicable to geometric matching, optical flow and semantic matching.

item.title: Learning Fast and Robust Target Models for Video Object Segmentation
item.description:
CVPR 2020 Oral
A light-weight optimization-based target model for fast VOS.

item.title: Probabilistic Regression for Visual Tracking
item.description:
CVPR 2020
Proposes a general formulation for probabilistic regression, which is then applied to visual tracking.

item.title: Learning Human-Object Interaction Detection using Interaction Points
item.description:
CVPR 2020
A fully-convolutional approach that directly detects the interactions between human-object pairs.

item.title: Learning Discriminative Model Prediction for Tracking
item.description:
ICCV 2019 Oral
An end-to-end tracking architecture, capable of fully exploiting both target and background appearance information for target model prediction.

item.title: Learning the Model Update for Siamese Trackers
item.description:
ICCV 2019
Replacing the handcrafted update function in Siamese trackers with a learnable update mechanism.

item.title: Tracking the Known and the Unknown by Leveraging Semantic Information
item.description:
BMVC 2019
“e propose a tracking framework that can exploit semantic information, without sacrificing the generic nature of the tracker.

item.title: ATOM: Accurate Tracking by Overlap Maximization
item.description:
CVPR 2019 Oral
Performing accurate bounding box estimation for generic visual tracking.

item.title: A Generative Appearance Model for End-to-end Video Object Segmentation
item.description:
CVPR 2019 Oral
A generative appearance module for end-to-end VOS.

item.title: Unveiling the Power of Deep Tracking
item.description:
ECCV 2019
How to better utilize deep features for correlation-based tracking.

item.title: Density Adaptive Point Set Registration
item.description:
CVPR 2018 Oral
Revisiting the foundations of probabilistic point cloud registration in order to tackle the key issue of sampling density variations.

item.title: ECO: Efficient Convolution Operators for Tracking
item.description:
CVPR 2017
Tackling the key causes behind the problems of computational complexity and over-fitting in correlation trackers.

item.title: Beyond Correlation Filters: Learning Continuous Convolution Operators for Visual Tracking
item.description:
ECCV 2016 Oral
A theoretical framework for discriminatively learning a convolution operator in the continuous spatial domain.

item.title: A Probabilistic Framework for Color-Based Point Set Registration
item.description:
CVPR 2016
A probabilistic point set registration framework that exploits available color information associated with the points.

item.title: Adaptive Decontamination of the Training Set: A Unified Formulation for Discriminative Visual Tracking
item.description:
CVPR 2016
A unified formulation for alleviating the problem of corrupted training samples in tracking-by-detection methods.

item.title: Learning Spatially Regularized Correlation Filters for Visual Tracking
item.description:
ICCV 2015
Mitigating the unwanted boundary effects, which limits the performance of correlation based trackers.

item.title: Discriminative Scale Space Tracking
item.description:
TPAMI & BMVC 2014
Accurate and fast scale estimation for visual tracking.

item.title: Adaptive Color Attributes for Real-Time Visual Tracking
item.description:
CVPR 2014 Oral
How to incorporate color information into visual tracking.
